typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	fileName as string ('58556')
}
source(output(
		{Item Code-رقم الصنف} as string,
		{Barcode-الباركود} as string,
		{Product Name Arabic-اسم الصنف عربى} as string,
		{Description Arabic-وصف الصنف عربى} as string,
		{Product Name English-اسم الصنف انجليزى} as string,
		{Description English-وصف الصنف انجليزى} as string,
		{Unit Item Barcode-الباركود للوحدة } as string,
		{No Of Unit Items-عدد الوحدات} as string,
		{Unit Weight/size-وزن/سعة الوحدة} as string,
		{Unit UOM-وحدة القياس} as string,
		{Package UOM-وحدة قياس الحزمة-التغليف} as string,
		{Cost Price-سعر التكلفة} as string,
		{Selling Price-سعر البيع} as string,
		{Brand-Trade Mark English-اسم العلامة التجارية انجليزى} as string,
		{Brand-Trade Mark Arabic-اسم العلامة التجارية عربى} as string,
		{MoCI Product Group-المجموعة السلعية - بالوزارة} as string,
		{Country of Oragen Name-اسم بلد المنشأ} as string,
		{Country of Oragen ISO3-كود 3 لبلد المنشأ} as string,
		{HS Code-رمز المنسق الجمركي} as string,
		{Supplier CR-رقم السجل التجارى للمورد} as string,
		{Supplier Name-اسم المورد} as string,
		{Category Level 1-\nتصنيف السلعة 1} as string,
		{Category Level 2-تصنيف السلعة 2} as string,
		{Category Level 3-تصنيف السلعة 3} as string,
		{Category Level 4-تصنيف السلعة 4} as string,
		{Width-العرض} as string,
		{Height-الطول} as string,
		{Depth-الارتفاع} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(STG_FILENAME = $fileName,
		STG_FILEDATE = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19)) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(SK_ID_SUR as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		ITEM_CODE as string,
		BARCODE as string,
		PRODUCT_NAME_ARABIC as string,
		DESCRIPTION_ARABIC as string,
		PRODUCT_NAME_ENGLISH as string,
		DESCRIPTION_ENGLISH as string,
		UNIT_ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		NO_OF_UNIT_ITEMS as string,
		UNIT_WEIGHT_SIZE as string,
		UNIT_UOM as string,
		PACKAGE_UOM as string,
		COST_PRICE as string,
		SELLING_PRICE as string,
		BRAND_TRADE_MARK_ENGLISH as string,
		BRAND_TRADE_MARK_ARABIC as string,
		MOCI_PRODUCT_GROUP as string,
		COUNTRY_OF_ORAGEN_NAME as string,
		COUNTRY_OF_ORAGEN_ISO as string,
		HS_CODE as string,
		SUPPLIER_CR as string,
		SUPPLIER_NAME as string,
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_1 as string,
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_2 as string,
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_3 as string,
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_4 as string,
		WIDTH as string,
		HEIGHT as string,
		DEPTH as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ITEM_CODE = {Item Code-رقم الصنف},
		BARCODE = {Barcode-الباركود},
		PRODUCT_NAME_ARABIC = {Product Name Arabic-اسم الصنف عربى},
		DESCRIPTION_ARABIC = {Description Arabic-وصف الصنف عربى},
		PRODUCT_NAME_ENGLISH = {Product Name English-اسم الصنف انجليزى},
		DESCRIPTION_ENGLISH = {Description English-وصف الصنف انجليزى},
		UNIT_ITEM_BARCODE = {Unit Item Barcode-الباركود للوحدة },
		NO_OF_UNIT_ITEMS = {No Of Unit Items-عدد الوحدات},
		UNIT_WEIGHT_SIZE = {Unit Weight/size-وزن/سعة الوحدة},
		UNIT_UOM = {Unit UOM-وحدة القياس},
		PACKAGE_UOM = {Package UOM-وحدة قياس الحزمة-التغليف},
		COST_PRICE = {Cost Price-سعر التكلفة},
		SELLING_PRICE = {Selling Price-سعر البيع},
		BRAND_TRADE_MARK_ENGLISH = {Brand-Trade Mark English-اسم العلامة التجارية انجليزى},
		BRAND_TRADE_MARK_ARABIC = {Brand-Trade Mark Arabic-اسم العلامة التجارية عربى},
		MOCI_PRODUCT_GROUP = {MoCI Product Group-المجموعة السلعية - بالوزارة},
		COUNTRY_OF_ORAGEN_NAME = {Country of Oragen Name-اسم بلد المنشأ},
		COUNTRY_OF_ORAGEN_ISO = {Country of Oragen ISO3-كود 3 لبلد المنشأ},
		HS_CODE = {HS Code-رمز المنسق الجمركي},
		SUPPLIER_CR = {Supplier CR-رقم السجل التجارى للمورد},
		SUPPLIER_NAME = {Supplier Name-اسم المورد},
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_1 = {Category Level 1-
تصنيف السلعة 1},
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_2 = {Category Level 2-تصنيف السلعة 2},
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_3 = {Category Level 3-تصنيف السلعة 3},
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_4 = {Category Level 4-تصنيف السلعة 4},
		WIDTH = {Width-العرض},
		HEIGHT = {Height-الطول},
		DEPTH = {Depth-الارتفاع},
		ID_SK = SK_ID_SUR,
		DS_FILENAME = STG_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME = STG_FILEDATE
	)) ~> stgProducts
